ai-tika-abh02t28:2_3: That’s why they’re talking about, thinking: ‘This is the eighth day.’
ai-tika-abh02t28:3_1: these are right view that the astute regard.
ai-tika-abh02t28:3_2: Giving up what’s undeveloped, they give up wrong view and develop accordingly.
ai-tika-abh02t28:3_4: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, should not develop, a basis of psychic power, without developing or cultivating even as develop, and without developing the mind.
ai-tika-abh02t28:3_5: They can’t endure salt, pleasant, or memorizing, and rude towards me.
ai-tika-abh02t28:4_0: In order to purify the aggregates, the drawback, and the escaped instrument of the aggregates, and the result of past deeds.
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_0: Why do you stand on like this?
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_1: There’s some millet with its bitter substance.

ai-tika-abh02t28:5_3: If he disparages the distributes of food, and so too for each other, right view, right thought,
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_5: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse,)
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_6: But someone with malicious intent—invited in the Sangha’s questioning on one side, and with a group of nine—unanimbarded as if fixing the distribution of garments, but not to be given away from rice.
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_7: So why shouldn’t the five factors of a borrowing to the it in the same way?

ai-tika-abh02t28:5_11: That’s why I said that action is purified, and cleansed with livelihood.
ai-tika-abh02t28:5_12: He practiced properly and suitably so as to deserve to be developed.
ai-tika-abh02t28:7_0: The Analysis of the Path is finished.
